about.title: About
about.subtitle: A bit about me
about.description: I'm Eduardo, a developer passionate about turning ideas into real products. With experience in Kotlin, React + Next.js, and team leadership as a Product Owner, I've delivered native apps, high-performance web platforms, and converting landing pages. My focus is on writing clean code, creating fluid experiences, and generating business value — whether in freelance projects or CLT/PJ teams.
